home.shortTermGoal: To become a junior Full Stack Web Developer within the next year.
home.longTermGoal: To advance to a senior Full Stack Web Developer role within the next five years.

about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a final-year Information Technology student with a strong passion for programming, particularly in web development using modern frameworks like ReactJS. I completed a 3-month internship at CY Vietnam Software Development Co., Ltd., where I gained valuable hands-on experience in developing and optimizing web applications using ReactJS. Additionally, I interned at Nacencom Technology Joint Stock Company, which further enhanced my practical skills and experience in the IT field. I am eager to apply my knowledge and continue honing my programming skills in a professional working environment.
about.description: I am a dedicated web developer with a passion for creating innovative solutions. I enjoy working on challenging projects and continuously learning new technologies.
about.name: Name

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.company1: CY Vietnam Software Development Co., Ltd.
experience.responsibility1: Utilized VueJS to build user interfaces and implemented features such as order management, delivery status notifications, and VNPay-integrated online payment.
experience.responsibility2: Used Vue Router to handle navigation and optimized the application for user experience.
experience.responsibility3: Improved user experience and resolved issues based on feedback from the QA team.
experience.responsibility4: Developed a library management system as a personal project.
experience.responsibility5: Implementation of Controller, Model for a website using the MVC architectural pattern.
experience.responsibility6: RESTful API (Application Programming Interfaces), Eloquent ORM(Object-Relational Mapping), MVC.

education.title: Education
education.schoolName: Hanoi College of Industrial Economics College

project1.title: C-to-C E-commerce Website
project1.shortDescription: Developed a feature-rich e-commerce platform with Super Admin controls and advanced user features.
project1.description: Developed a feature-rich e-commerce platform with Super Admin controls (user/shop/product/category/promotion/banner management) and Web user features (auth, shopping, orders, reviews, seller tools, chat, notifications, and marketing).
project1.roleDescription: Developing user interfaces and integrating APIs
project1.responsibility1: Developed authentication features, including login and logout functionality
project1.responsibility2: Implemented product approval system, enabling review, approval, and rejection of new products
project1.responsibility3: Designed a notification system to inform users about delivery updates and notify shop admins about user orders
project1.responsibility4: Built functionality to add, edit, delete user addresses and set default addresses
project1.responsibility5: Integrated VNPay for seamless online payment during checkout
project1.responsibility6: Developed features for order management, including order tracking and cancellation
project1.responsibility7: Implemented delivery status management, allowing users and shop admins to track and update order statuses

project2.title: Library Management Website
project2.description: Developed a comprehensive Library Management System with dual interfaces (Admin & User). Admin website features authentication system, books/categories management, borrowing tracking, fine management, user control, and multilingual support. User interface includes account management, book browsing/searching, borrowing management, dark/light mode theming, and responsive design.
project2.responsibility1: Led full-stack development from initial design to deployment
project2.responsibility2: Implemented secure authentication and role-based access control
project2.responsibility3: Developed comprehensive book management system with CRUD operations
project2.responsibility4: Built borrowing tracking system and fine management features
project2.responsibility5: Created responsive UI/UX design with Vue.js and React.js frontends
project2.responsibility6: Designed and implemented RESTful APIs with Laravel backend
